mapper.insert: insert into apply_select select seq_apply.nextval, client_name, client_age, client_region, #{a_apy_position}, #{team_id}, client_id from client where client_id=#{sid}
mapper.select: select a_apy_position, apply_id from apply_select where apply_id = #{sid}
select client_id from team where client_id = #{sid}
